According to the doctrine of Pythagoras revealed by Hieroclen, two things agree in the efficacy of prayer: the voluntary movement of our soul, and aid from heaven. The first of these things is that which sceks goodness; and the other that which shows it. Prayer is a medium between our quest and the celestial gift. One seeks one prays in vain, if one adds not prayer to research and researeh to prayer. Virtue is an emanation from God; it is like a reflected image of the Divinity, the resemblance ol which alone constitutes the good and the beautiful.
